amendment.description: An amendment numbered 73 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funding for the rule titled "Control of Air Pollution From New Motor Vehicles: Heavy- Duty Engine and Vehicle Standards.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
